Interface SmartAccountSigner

Encapsulates the required input parameters for creating a signer for SmartAccount.

interface SmartAccountSigner {
    address: string;
    payloadSigner?: PayloadSigner;
    secret: any;
    transactionBuilder?: TransactionBuilder;
}
